channel.title: Covr on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in Covr on inSileco

item.title: Continuous integration for R projects: from Travis CI to GitHub actions step by step
item.description: I have been using Travis CI (https://travis-ci.org/) since 2015 and GitHub Actions (hereafter GH Actions; https://github.com/features/actions) for over a year now1. While using these two hosted continuous integration services, I came to realize that I was spending less time troubleshooting with GH Actions than I was with Travis.
